duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and manage jobs using an automated scheduling system, including adding and removing jobs from the scheduler.
Utilize monitoring tools to oversee the company network and nightly store polling system.
Monitor the company store PC network using appropriate tools.
Process phone requests and manually submit batch processing jobs while monitoring their completion.
Troubleshoot problems and assist in their resolution, notifying relevant personnel of exceptions (e.g., batch processing errors).
Assist the Shift Team Leader in department initiatives and demonstrate good organizational skills.
Utilize knowledge of hardware configurations, AS/400, UNIX, and Microsoft commands, with a preference for automated batch processing.
Pay attention to detail and use knowledge of monitoring and Data Centre Infrastructure Management (DCIM) tools.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a computer-related course of study
